oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Initiierung von betriebsübergreifendem Unternehmertum am Beispiel der Initiative „BioRegio Zentralschweiz“
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hofstetter, Dr. Pius
Richter, Dr. Toralf
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social aspects
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Since agricultural markets become increasingly liberalised, the importance of entrepreneurship in agriculture increases. A number of internal and external factors related to farm management impede currently the diffusion of entrepreneurial skills. The initiative ‘BioRegio Zentralschweiz’ encourages organic farmers in the region Central Switzerland to start their own added-value projects by providing a common service and a logistic platform for members. Experiences of this initiative show that farmers need to be guided and supported by external consultants particularly in the pre-start-phase of such a project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hofstetter, Dr. Pius and Richter, Dr. Toralf (2009) Initiierung von betriebsübergreifendem Unternehmertum am Beispiel der Initiative „BioRegio Zentralschweiz“. Paper at: 10. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Zürich, 11.-13. Februar 2009.
